statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.PartnerID , AA.ChannelID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
, BB.PartnerName , CC.ChannelName
FROM dbo.TPartnerChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TPartner BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PartnerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.*
, BB.PartnerName , CC.ChannelName
FROM dbo.TPartnerChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TPartner BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PartnerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TPartnerChannel ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, PartnerID, ChannelID, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #PartnerID#, #ChannelID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TPartnerChannel SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, PartnerID = #PartnerID# , ChannelID = #ChannelID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
